metadata.title: CVE-2023-52708 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mmc: mmc_spi: fix error handling in mmc_spi_probe()If mmc_add_host() fails, it doesn't need to call mmc_remove_host(),or it will cause null-ptr-deref, because of deleting a not addeddevice in mmc_remove_host().To fix this, goto label 'fail_glue_init', if mmc_add_host() fails,and change the label 'fail_add_host' to 'fail_gpiod_request'.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
